articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a congratulatory message from Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, president of the People's Republic of China and chairman of the Central Military Commission of the PRC, on April 11.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend congratulations to you on your reelection as first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 I believe that the fraternal Korean people would certainly achieve fresh and greater successes in the state-building and various sectors for the economic development under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by you.
					
					 The traditional Sino-DPRK friendship was provided and developed by the leaders of the elder generations of the two countries and it is our common precious asset.
					
					 The Chinese side, together with the DPRK side, will steadily develop the bilateral traditional relations of friendship and cooperation, bring wellbeing to the two countries and the two peoples and contribute to the regional peace and stability.
					
					 I wish your country prosperity and the Korean people happiness and wellbeing.

articles.title: Kloral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Government
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Government
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a floral basket sent by the government of the People's Republic of China in congratulation of his reelection as first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, handed the floral basket to an official concerned on Saturday.
					
					 Written on the ribbon of the floral basket were the letters "Congratulations on Comrade Kim Jong Un's reelection as first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK".

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
Beijing, April 12 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Beijing hosted a reception on Friday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there on invitation were Wang Jiarui, vice-chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference and head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, Ding Wei, vice-minister of Culture, Wu Donghe, chairman of the China-Korea Friendship Association, Liu Jianchao, assistant to the foreign minister, and other officials concerned.
					
					 DPRK ambassador to China Ji Jae Ryong and his embassy officials were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Ji Jae Ryong said: 
					
					 The whole life of Kim Il Sung was one of the great revolutionary and peerless patriot who devoted his all to the prosperity of the country, happiness of the people and the cause of global independence, believing in the people as in Heaven.
					
					 For their great exploits on behalf of the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il are alive in the hearts of not only the Korean people but humankind of the world including the Chinese people.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is making a ceaseless forced march of the love for the people to translate the desires of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il into reality.
					
					 Wang Jiarui said that Kim Il Sung founded the Workers' Party of Korea, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the Korean People's Army. He praised Kim Il Sung for performing great exploits to shine long in history, adding that he will always be alive in the hearts of the Korean people.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is wisely leading the Korean people true to the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, he noted.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people would achieve further successes in their work for the prosperity of the country and a durable peace on the Korean Peninsula under the leadership of the WPK headed by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kang Sok Ju Meets Mexico Party Delegation
articles.content:
Kang Sok Ju Meets Mexico Party Delegation
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Sunday met and had a talk with the delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico headed by National Leader Alberto Anaya Gutierrez.

articles.title: KPA Service Personnel Meet at Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
KPA Service Personnel Meet at Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Officers and men of the Army, Navy, Air and Anti-Air Forces of the Korean People's Army held a ceremony at the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday to pay high tribute to Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and take an oath to be loyal to Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 Present at the ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam and other officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and commanding officers of the KPA.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 A speech was made by KPA Vice Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA.
					
					 He said all the service personnel paid highest respects to the Generalissimos and extend best wishes for immortality to them on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 He went on to say:
					
					 Thanks to the outstanding Songun revolutionary leadership of the Generalissimos, the revolutionary armed forces of Korea which were organized in the thick forest of Mt. Paektu could lead the Korean revolution in the van while defending the party and the leader, the country and people for decades and thanks to their rare wisdom and outstanding foresightedness the eternal prosperity of the nation has been firmly guaranteed.
					
					 The feats of the Generalissimos who ushered in the Juche era and Songun era with their prominent ideological and theoretical activities and extraordinary leadership and dedicated their whole lives to the sacred revolutionary cause for the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people will shine in the history of the country for all ages.
					
					 All the service personnel are filled with steadfast faith and will to defend the exploits the Generalissimos performed in army-building, consolidate in every way the single-minded unity of the entire army with the Supreme Commander as the monolithic center of unity and leadership and guarantee with arms the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the revolutionary cause of Songun pioneered from Mt. Paektu.
					
					 All the participants chanted the slogans representing their faith and will to glorify for all ages the Generalissimos' Songun revolutionary history and exploits and devotedly defend the Supreme Commander with arms.
					
					 There took place a match-past of the officers and men of the army, navy and air and anti-air forces of the KPA and cadets of the military academies at all levels and students of revolutionary schools.

articles.title: Participants in Art Festival Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Participants in Art Festival Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Artistes of different countries and overseas Koreans taking part in the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday.
					 They paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state, they made bows to them.
					
					 They went round the halls in which the orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display and the halls which house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches they used during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 They made entries into the visitor's book.

articles.title: Foreign Guests, Overseas Koreans Pay Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Guests, Overseas Koreans Pay Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests and overseas Koreans taking part in the 16th Kimilsungia Festival visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Sunday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 They laid floral baskets before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from IIJI Secretary General
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from IIJI Secretary General
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by the secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI) on a visit to the DPRK.
					 Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the IIJI, handed the gift to an official concerned on Saturday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from National Leader of Workers' Party of Mexico
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from National Leader of Workers' Party of Mexico
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The gift was handed over to Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, by National Leader Alberto Anaya Gutierrez on Sunday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Russian Publishing House
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Russian Publishing House
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from Forum book publishing house of Russia on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 Sychev Vladimir, director of the publishing house, on a visit to the DPRK handed the gift to an official concerned.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Regional Association of General Association of Koreans in China
Overseas Koreans Delegations Here
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Delegations Here
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Nam Su, secretary general of the Koreans' Council in New Zealand, a delegation of the Association of Korean National Businessmen in China led by Chairman Phyo Song Ryong and a delegation of the Korean Businessmen's Association in Dandong, China led by Chairman Kim Thaek Ryong, arrived here Sunday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: First-Day Performances of April Spring Friendship Art Festival Given
articles.content:
First-Day Performances of April Spring Friendship Art Festival Given
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- First-day performances of the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival were given before full houses at theaters here on Saturday.
					 The National Dancing Troupe of Belarus, the Dwiki-Music Group of Indonesia, a Swiss pop singer and the art troupe of Koreans in Japan performed at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre, the Chinese art troupe (Eastern Song and Dance Ensemble), the Malaysia My Harmonica World Ensemble and the art troupe of the National Song and Dance Theatre of Vietnam at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre, the Academy Ensemble of the Interior Unit of the Russian Ministry of Interior, a Cuban guitarist, the art troupe of Koreans in China and the art troupe of the International United Confederation of Koreans at the Ponghwa Art Theater, the Vienna Wind Instrumental Group of Austria, famous artistes of the Varna Opera Theatre of Bulgaria and the string quartette of the Chamber Orchestra of France at the Moranbong Theater, the Song and Dance Ensemble of the Mongolian Army, a brass band of Finland and the dance troupe of Kiev Dance Theater of Ukraine at the Central Youth Hall, members of the all-star delegat
					
					 ion of Chopin Music University of Poland, an Italian opera singer, a German cellist of Creusen Concert, a Korean soloist in Australia and party and the art troupe of Koreans in the U.S. at the music hall of Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory and the Chinese art troupe (Shandong Provincial Circus), the Circus of State Acrobatic Company of Russia, a circus of Egypt and a Thai magician and party at the Pyongyang Circus Theatre.
					
					 Put on the stages were colorful numbers high in ideological value and artistry and strong in national flavor, which reflect the desire of the people to boost the bonds of friendship under the banner of independence and live in a new peaceful world.
					
					 The performers represented the profound reverence of all people for Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who performed immortal feats on behalf of the times and history and Marshal Kim Jong Un who is leading Songun Korea to prosperity with his rare political caliber.
					
					 Among the audience were members of the festival organizing committee, officials concerned, working people and youth and students in Pyongyang, diplomatic envoys here and foreign guests and overseas Koreans.
					
					 Performances go on.

articles.title: 16th Kimilsungia Festival Opens
articles.content:
16th Kimilsungia Festival Opens
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The 16th Kimilsungia Festival opened here with splendor on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the venue of the festival are flowers of the sun reflecting the sincere minds of armed forces organs, ministries, national institutions and many other units, service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children.
					
					 Also on display are flowers presented with sincerity by the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, overseas Koreans, foreign diplomatic missions and missions of international organizations here, friendship and solidarity organizations and figures of different countries, members of the supporting associations for propagating immortal flowers and Chinese residents in the DPRK.
					
					 An opening ceremony took place at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition on Sunday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, officials concerned, officials of units which displayed flowers, service personnel, working people, overseas Koreans delegations and overseas Koreans.
					
					 Also invited there were members of the Indonesian government cultural delegation headed by Hari Untoro Dradjat, senior advisor to the minister of Tourism and Creative Economy, and other foreign guests.
					
					 Kim Chang Do, chairman of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee, in an opening address expressed belief that the festival will contribute to encouraging the army and people of the DPRK in their heroic struggle to usher in a great prosperity of Songun Korea and boosting the good-neighborly and friendly relations with the world progressive people.
					
					 Hari Untoro Dradjat in a congratulatory speech expressed belief that the two countries would continue deepening the friendly relations together with Kimilsungia in the future, too.
					
					 The participants went round the venue of the festival.

articles.title: IAAF-27th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon Held
articles.content:
IAAF-27th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon Held
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The IAAF-27th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon took place in Pyongyang on Sunday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The marathon was divided into first class (42.195 km), junior class (21.0975 km) and juvenile class (10 km).
					
					 It brought together marathoners  from 15 countries and regions including the DPRK, China, Russia, Namibia, South Africa, Uzbekistan, Ukraine, Ethiopia, Zimbabwe, Kenya and Taipei of China and marathon amateurs from Germany, Norway, Switzerland, Australia and other scores of countries and regions. 
					
					 An opening ceremony was held at the Kim Il Sung Stadium Sunday.
					
					 Present there were Kwak Pom Gi, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier and chairman of the State Planning Commission, officials concerned, sports persons, working people in the city and foreign guests.
					
					 Tong Jong Ho, minister of Construction and Building-Materials Industry who doubles as chairman of the DPRK Marathon Association, in his opening address expressed the belief that the marathoners and amateurs will exchange good experience, deepening the feelings of friendship.
					
					 Then there took place a marathon.
					
					 More than 1 000 men and women marathoners and amateurs ran the whole distance of the track with strong will and patience.
					
					 Working people and school youth and children waved to the marathoners and applauded them in streets.
					
					 DPRK runners Pak Chol (man) and Kim Hye Gyong (woman) came first in the first class race, runner of Rwanda Mvuyekure Jean Pierre (man) and DPRK runner Kim Hye Song (woman) second and Ukrainian runner Babaryka Ivan (man) and DPRK runner Kim Mi Gyong (woman) third.
					
					 At the closing ceremony, trophy cups, medals and diplomas were awarded to the players who proved successful at the marathon.

articles.title: Performance Given by Members of Art Group of Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace
articles.content:
Performance Given by Members of Art Group of Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Members of the art group of the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace gave a performance on Sunday at the palace to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun).
					 The performance began with prologue "We Dance and Sing on Day of the Sun ". Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as light music and song immortal classic masterpiece "Nostalgia", folk song solo "Mangyongdae, the best pride" and high-pitched flute and chorus "Mangyongdae is flower garden".
					
					 The performers impressively sang of the boundless reverence of schoolchildren for Kim Il Sung who brought up the new rising generation to be pillars who will advance the Korean revolution.
					
					 Dance "We Will Fully Display Patriotism" and other numbers depicted well the schoolchildren who are reliably growing up to be pillars of strong and prosperous Korea equipped with knowledge, a good moral character and good health while learning to their heart's content under the socialist educational system provided by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and being exalted by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Among the audience were Ri Il Hwan, department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., the youth league, officials of the youth league and schoolchildren in the city.

articles.title: Joint National Meeting of KCU Organizations Held
articles.content:
Joint National Meeting of KCU Organizations Held
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) organizations was held before the statue of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung at Changdok School on Sunday to celebrate his 102nd birth anniversary.
					 Present there were KCU delegates from provinces, schoolchildren in Pyongyang and pupils expected to join the KCU.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Thae Bok, Ri Il Hwan, department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of party organs and the youth league in Pyongyang, officials concerned, war veterans, persons of meritorious service and parents of pupils.
					
					 Prior to the meeting the participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statue of Kim Il Sung at the school and paid tribute to him.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., the youth league, made a report.
					
					 He said that Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il showed all loving care and benevolence for the KCU members.
					
					 Very rosy is the future of the KCU members thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un who is carrying forward on the noblest level the Generalissimos' intention of loving the rising generation, he noted.
					
					 He called upon all the KCU members to always bear in mind the trust and benevolence of the Generalissimos and more firmly prepare themselves to be the reliable reserves of the revolutionary cause of Songun and pillars supporting strong and prosperous Korea in the future under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Then there took place an accession ceremony of the KCU at the meeting.
					
					  Led by Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, pupils took an oath before joining the KCU. 
					
					 Officials, war veterans and persons of meritorious service put red ties around their necks and pinned badges of the KCU on their chests.
					
					 The new KCU members made their first salute, responding to the slogan "Always Ready for the Socialist Motherland!"
					
					 Congratulatory speeches were made by DPRK Hero Ji Yong Chun, lecturer of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, Dr. and Assistant Prof. Ri Kuk Chol of Kim Il Sung University and Labor Hero and People's Sportsman Kim Un Guk.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place in various parts of the DPRK on Sunday to celebrate the 2nd anniversary of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's election to the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state.
					 Youth and students danced to the tune of songs such as "Our Leader Loved by People" at the venues of the dancing parties in Pyongyang.
					
					 Reflected on the faces of youth and students is the profound reverence for Kim Jong Un who is leading the country and its people to victory and prosperity, being possessed of rare ideological and theoretical wisdom, outstanding political caliber and noble virtues.
					
					 They danced to the tune of cheerful songs like "We Will Devote Our Youth to Motherland" and "Let's Learn" representing their enthusiasm for performing feats in the worthwhile drive for the country's prosperity.
					
					 Chorus "We Know Nobody but You" resounded forth, reflecting the unshakable faith and will of the young vanguard to devotedly defend Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There took place similar dancing parties at the provincial seats, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: State Commendations Awarded to People's Security Persons
articles.content:
State Commendations Awarded to People's Security Persons
Haeju, April 13 (KCNA) -- State commendations were awarded to Choe Yong Il and O Myong Su, people's security persons of the South Hwanghae Provincial People's Security Bureau who displayed the self-sacrificing spirit in the drive to defuse explosives.
					 They covered with their bodies an explosive going off while defusing a time bomb dropped by the U.S. imperialist aggressors during the past Fatherland Liberation War and thus defended the tower to the immortality of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the life and property of the people and died a heroic death.
					
					 An awarding ceremony took place at the South Hwanghae Provincial People's Security Bureau on Sunday.
					
					 Present there were Kang Phil Hun, director of the Political Bureau of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, Pak Yong Ho, chief secretary of the South Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, people's security persons and the bereaved families.
					
					 After a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK was read out, the title of DPRK Hero, Gold Star Medal and Order of National Flag 1st Class awarding to Choe Yong Il and O Myong Su were conveyed to their bereaved families.
					
					 Certificates of patriotic martyrs were awarded to them.
					
					 Then Order of National Flag 1st Class was awarded to Kim Chang Il and Im Chang Sok, people's security persons of the South Hwanghae Provincial People's Security Bureau.
					
					 Resolution-making speeches were made at the ceremony.

articles.title: Title of Labor Hero Awarded to DPRK Composers
articles.content:
Title of Labor Hero Awarded to DPRK Composers
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Composers Hwang Jin Yong, U Jong Hui and An Jong Ho were awarded the title of Labor Hero and Gold Medal (Hammer and Sickle) and Order of National Flag 1st Class on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK announced on April 12.
					 They wrote lots of famous music strong in ideological value and artistry and representing the true feelings of the people, making a great contribution to encouraging all the service personnel and people in their struggle to defend socialism and achieve the final victory in the building of a thriving nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces U.S.-Japan-S. Korea Confab against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces U.S.-Japan-S. Korea Confab against DPRK
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the chief negotiators of the U.S., Japan and south Korea for six-party talks met in Washington to discuss "decisive sanctions" against the DPRK by the UN Security Council in case of an "additional provocation" from the DPRK, talking about "its threat of 4th nuclear test" and "missile provocation".
					 Rodong Sinmun comments on this on Sunday: 
					
					 It is a criminal conspiracy to deprive the DPRK of its sovereign right through international sanctions and military pressure and isolate and stifle it at any cost.
					
					 It is quite natural for the DPRK to take self-defensive countermeasures including beefing up of nuclear deterrence to protect the country and socialism and defend peace on the Korean peninsula from the U.S.-south Korean puppet forces' evermore escalating war moves against the DPRK.
					
					 The "tripartite dialogue" of the U.S., Japan and south Korean authorities who threatened to slap sanctions against the DPRK, labeling the DPRK's just cause for defending its sovereignty as a "provocation," is an unpardonable challenge to it  and a dangerous adventure leading the situation on the Korean peninsula to an uncontrollable catastrophe.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces will be held wholly accountable for the disastrous consequences to be entailed by their reckless act against the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. and Other Hostile Forces' Sinister Intention against DPRK Remains Unchanged: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. and Other Hostile Forces' Sinister Intention against DPRK Remains Unchanged: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The United States has escalated hostile acts against the DPRK under the pretext of its nuclear and "human rights" issues, revealing the sinister intention to intensify sanctions against the DPRK, talking about "missile threat". 
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. is staging the Foal Eagle joint military exercises at the climax stage together with the south Korean authorities, posing a serious threat to the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are driving the inter-Korean relations into a catastrophe again, while positively cooperating with the U.S., their master, in its anti-DPRK nuclear, "human rights" and missile rackets.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This grave situation goes to clearly prove that the sinister intention of the U.S. and other hostile forces against the DPRK remains unchanged and cannot be changed.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are drawing a clear conclusion from the fact that the U.S. and south Korean authorities are escalating confrontational moves against the DPRK while resorting to the unprecedented madcap nuclear and "human rights" rackets against it.
					
					 The conclusion is that the DPRK should win the final victory under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 History and the situation prove once again that it is the very just option that the DPRK has access to nuclear deterrence for self-defense to protect the sovereignty and security of the country and the nation. 
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities would be well advised to clearly understand that any pressure and confrontational moves can never work on the DPRK and make a bold decision to roll back the hostile policy toward the DPRK at once.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Denounces U.S.-S. Korea Combined Aerial Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Denounces U.S.-S. Korea Combined Aerial Drill
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea made public a statement on April 10 denouncing the U.S.-south Korea combined aerial drill escalating military tensions.
					 The statement recalled that the largest-ever drill, codenamed Max Thunder, is being staged in the sky above south Korea from April 11 to 25.
					
					 It referred to the fact that U.S. and south Korean marine corps recently carried out the Ssangyong landing drill aimed at "occupying Pyongyang" in the area of Phohang, North Kyongsang Province.
					
					 All these are an undisguised hostile act of deteriorating the relations between the south and the north and escalating tensions on the Korean peninsula, the statement noted.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The war-like forces are openly saying that the drill with at least 100 planes and more than 1 400 troops involved is a "drill for precision bombardment of the stronghold of the north and a drill for transport planes of the air force to supply war materials to special unit infiltrated deep into area of the north."
					
					 This shows that the war exercises are offensive ones under the simulated condition of a real war.
					
					 The statement queried whether the U.S. and the south Korean authorities have the will for peace on the Korean peninsula while staging the largest-ever war exercises or not.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Aerial Military Exercises under Fire
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Aerial Military Exercises under Fire
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The People's Action for Realizing Peace against War in south Korea issued a statement on April 11 denouncing the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and the south Korean puppet forces for their joint aerial military exercises.
					 The statement noted that the Max Thunder joint military exercises being staged in the sky above south Korea from that day are chiefly aimed to "make a precision strike at base of provocation" and drop the supplies to special unit which infiltrated deep into area of the north.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Some years ago the first exercises started with more than ten planes involved. Their scale increased every year, expanding into the largest-ever aerial strike exercises with at least 100 planes involved this year. This is a demonstration of armed forces and military pressure upon the north.
					
					 South Korea and the U.S. have recently expanded the scale of military exercises and intensified media campaign. This is aimed at intentionally getting on the nerves of the north and escalating military tensions.
					
					 It is impossible to have dialogue and negotiation amid the hostile demonstration of armed forces such as the largest-ever aerial strike exercises in the wake of the large-scale landing drill of marine corps.
					
					 The statement urged south Korea and the U.S. to immediately stop the Max Thunder, an undisguised demonstration of armed forces against the DPRK.

articles.title: Russian Foreign Ministry Demands U.S. and S. Korea Stop Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
Russian Foreign Ministry Demands U.S. and S. Korea Stop Joint Military Exercises
Moscow, April 11 (KCNA) -- The Russian Foreign Ministry in a statement on April 10 urged the U.S. and south Korea to stop their joint military exercises.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The move of the U.S. and the south Korea to escalate the joint military exercises on the Korean peninsula is sparking off serious concern.
					
					 According to information available, the U.S. and south Korea attempt to kick off a new airborne drill with so many airplanes involved, before the end of the large-scale Foal Eagle joint military exercises.
					
					 What draws attention is that a drill of mounting a precision attack on targets in the "enemy's" territory and a logistic drill for groups for subversive activities and sabotage in the rear of the "enemy" will be staged during the exercises.
					
					 Russia has clarified repeatedly that the expansion of military action going beyond far the scope of the present threat in Northeast Asia will not be helpful to the normalization of the situation but bring serious consequences to the regional peace and stability.
					
					 We stress once again that it is high time to abandon the thought to coordinate the pending issues of the Korean peninsula by force, and to establish a multilateral security system in Northeast Asia.
					
					 All the disputes should be solved through political and diplomatic means, negotiation and talks.

articles.title: DPRK Cultural and Art Exhibition Opens in China
articles.content:
DPRK Cultural and Art Exhibition Opens in China
Beijing, April 12 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Cultural and Art Exhibition opened in Wuxi City, Jiangsu Province of China on April 11 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the exhibition hall were photos documenting the exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of the peerlessly great men, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and art pieces associated with the talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were figures of various circles in the city and a delegation of the Korean Overseas Exhibition General Bureau.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Wuxi City People's Political Consultative Conference and other Chinese speakers said the cultural exchange between the two countries is of great significance in further boosting the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship, adding they will conduct more brisk cultural exchanges with the DPRK to contribute to the Sino-DPRK friendship.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Art Exhibitions Opened Abroad
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo and Art Exhibitions Opened Abroad
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Korean book, photo and art exhibitions opened in Obninsk City, Kaluga Region of Russia, Lima City of Peru and Pernik City of Bulgaria between April 2 and 7 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) and the 2nd anniversary of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's election to the top posts of the party and state.
					 Displayed at the venues of the exhibitions were photos dealing with immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and other books, photos showing the true picture of Songun Korea and fine art pieces associated with the wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The vice-mayor of Obninsk City, Kaluga Region of Russia recalled that the DPRK is a state capable of manufacturing and launching satellite and a nuclear weapons state, saying that the DPRK is powerful.
					
					 The curator of the History and Fine Art Museum in Obninsk City said that the politics of loving the people pursued by Kim Jong Un who spares nothing for the people enables the DPRK to win victory after victory, striking the world with wonder.
					
					 The first vice-chairman of a district council of Lima City, Peru said that it was a great honor for him and all inhabitants in the district to hold an exhibition on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 The vice-mayor of Pernik City of Bulgaria said that he was glad to have an opportunity to know well about successes achieved by the Korean people and their wisdom, talents and high cultural and art skills.
					
					 He expressed belief that the exhibition will make a contribution to further developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Events for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) took place in different countries.
					 A national meeting, a book exhibition and a film show took place in Ecuador, a book and photo exhibition and a film show in Romania, a photo exhibition in Nigeria and a friendship concert in Vietnam between March 24 and April 6.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the book and photo exhibitions were photos dealing with the revolutionary life and exploits of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Also on display were works of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and books and photos introducing proud successes achieved by the army and people of the DPRK under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Films shown included a Korean film "Always in Hearts of Mankind".
					
					 The chairman of the Ecuadorian Cultural Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea who doubles as chairman of the Ecuadorian committee for celebrating the 102nd birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung said in his speech that the President devoted all his life to the independence of the country, happiness of the people and the accomplishment of the human cause of independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania expressed his conviction that the book and photo exhibition held in the building of the party on the occasion of the Day of the Sun will mark a significant occasion for fully realizing the greatness of the President.
					
					 A department director of the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria said that the banner of independence which was held high by Kim Il Sung served as a motive force greatly encouraging the Korean people and progressive mankind.
					
					 The vice-minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism of Vietnam said that the Vietnamese people are deeply revering Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked by Paper of Koreans in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked by Paper of Koreans in Uzbekistan
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Thongil, the paper of Koreans in Uzbekistan, on April 10 carried a special write-up on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun). It was illustrated with a photo of his birthplace in Mangyongdae.
					 The paper in an article said that the DPRK is significantly celebrating April 15, the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung who is the eternal President of the DPRK, every year.
					
					 The paper also introduced the happy working people, school youth and students spending a pleasant time at the Munsu Water Park, accompanied with photos.
					
					 The paper carried the news that the IAAF-27th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon will be held in Pyongyang on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Brazilian Organization, Malian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Brazilian Organization, Malian Political Party
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Special write-ups were posted by a Brazilian organization and a Malian political party on their websites on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK on March 25 in an article titled "President Kim Il Sung, distinguished great man in 20th century", illustrated with the portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung, said:
					
					 The DPRK could turn into a socialist power of independence, self-sufficiency and self-reliant defence under the leadership of the President.
					
					 Thanks to this powerful foundation and potentials the DPRK could invariably hold fast to the socialist banner and make a leap forward to the high peak of building a thriving nation when socialism was frustrated in different countries in the closing years of the last century.
					
					 All epochal events in the building of a thriving nation in the DPRK are a brilliant embodiment of the ideal and desire of the President.
					
					 The African Party for the Solidarity and Justice of Mali on April 7 in an article titled "Kim Il Sung, shining august name" said that his august name is shining as a symbol of national liberation and the era of independence, symbol of noble virtues and lofty sense of obligation and banner of eternal victory.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Figures
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks took place in the Antri Miek Publishing House of Cambodia, an Ethiopian company and a company of Malaysia between March 31 and April 3 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The director of the Antri Miek Publishing House of Cambodia said that Kim Il Sung was a great leader who founded the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK, adding: His exploits will always be cherished in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also the Cambodian people.
					
					 The chief designer of an Ethiopian company and other speakers highly praised the President for defeating the two imperialisms in one generation and turning the DPRK into a socialist power of independence, self-sufficiency and self-reliance in defence.
					
					 They said that the Juche idea founded by him is greatly encouraging the cause of progressive mankind for independence.
					
					 The might of the single-minded unity provided and glorified by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il is being fully demonstrated by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, they noted.
					
					 The director of a Malaysian company said that the President devoted his whole life to accomplishing the human cause of independence, noting that the Korean people and the world progressive people are significantly celebrating the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of the President every year.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Newspapers of Indonesia, Laos
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Newspapers of Indonesia, Laos
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of Indonesia and Laos carried special write-ups on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Indonesian newspaper International Media on April 3 carried special articles, illustrated with the portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The paper in an article titled "Kim Il Sung, shining august name" said that his august name is shining as a symbol of national liberation and the era of independence, symbol of noble virtues and lofty sense of obligation and banner of eternal victory.
					
					 The paper praised him for liberating Korea, winning the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and performing undying feats in accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 Prominent figures of foreign countries who were honored to meet President admired his personality and streets, institutions and organizations of many countries were renamed after him, it said.
					
					 The paper said in an article titled "Stable Korean society" that the high socio-political stability is being ensured thanks to the absolute support of the people in the DPRK quite contrary to propaganda of some Western media.
					
					 It introduced the advantages of the Korean socialist system in which the whole country forms a harmonious family helping and leading each other forward.
					
					 The Indonesian paper The Indonesia Times on April 2 in an article titled "Happy day of the President" lauded the personality of Kim Il Sung as a great man who felt joy at devoting all his life to the people.
					
					 The Lao newspapers Pasason and Vatelao on April 2 carried articles praising the life and exploits of the President who is being deeply revered by the world progressive people as the eternal sun of Juche. The articles were illustrated with the portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by Swiss Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by Swiss Organization on Its Website
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The full text of President Kim Il Sung's work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" was posted by the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on its website on April 3.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 82 (1993), comprehensively indicates the ways of achieving the great national unity including the issues of founding a unified state through the unity of the whole nation and getting united based on patriotism and the spirit of national independence, issues of promoting co-existence, co-prosperity and common interests, putting an end to all political disputes that foment division and confrontation between fellow countrymen and trusting each other between the north and the south  and achieving unity and issues of joining hands on the road to national reunification, without rejecting each other because of differences in isms.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Mexican Organization in Its Bulletin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Mexican Organization in Its Bulletin
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The detailed gist of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was carried by the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea in its bulletin on April 5.
					 The work, made public on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the revolutionary exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed in their lifetimes. It indicates tasks for firmly defending and eternally glorifying their ideas and exploits.

articles.title: News of Kim Jong Un's Reelection Reported by Foreign Media
articles.content:
News of Kim Jong Un's Reelection Reported by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- News of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's reelection as first chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK was reported by foreign media on April 9 and 10.
					 The Phoenix Satellite TV Holdings LTD., Hong Kong, China reported that Kim Jong Un was reelected as first chairman of the NDC of the DPRK at the 1st Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					
					 Similar news was also reported by foreign media.
					
					 They included Chinese newspapers Beijing Daily, Liberation Daily and Dandong Daily, CCTV, International Broadcasting Service, Chinese internet homepages, the Vietnamese newspapers Nhan Dan, Quan Doi Nhan Dan and Vietnam News, the Iranian newspaper Iran News, Myanmar news agency and newspapers, the Indian papers Times of India, NDTV and Genius TV Broadcasting Service, the Thai paper Bangkok Post, the Singaporean newspaper Straits Times, Tokyo Shimbun, Asahi Shimbun, the Pakistani paper Daily Times, Samma TV Broadcasting Service, Algerian internet newspapers, a Turkish news agency and its paper Sabah, the German newspaper Die Welt, a French internet newspaper and its BFM TV Broadcasting Service and a Chilean paper.
					
					 Papers of Myanmar, Thailand, Algeria and Chile carried photos of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Chinese newspapers Jilin Xinwen and Jilin Daily on April 9 carried news that Kim Jong Un watched men's and women's football games between Kalmaegi team and Jebi team, illustrated with his photos.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Moves to Seize Korean Hall of Chongryon Flayed in Poland
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Moves to Seize Korean Hall of Chongryon Flayed in Poland
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A political party and organization of Poland issued statements on April 2 and 3 in denunciation of the Japanese authorities' crackdown upon the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The Executive Committee of the Warsaw Regional Committee of the Polish Communist Party expressed the resentment at the fact that the Tokyo District Court made a decision on allowing the sale of the land and building of the Korean Hall of Chongryon, and went on:
					
					 The court's act is a mean move to block the legitimate activities of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The Japanese authorities have not yet made an apology and reparation for their crimes committed against the Korean people.
					
					 We strongly demand the Japanese authorities withdraw at once their decision on allowing the sale of the building of Chongryon and stop all sorts of persecution against Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association stated:
					
					 The Japanese authorities have resorted to the moves to distort history in order to conceal their past crimes and evade the responsibility for them. This is the height of shamelessness and an insult to the dignity of the people of Korea and other Asian countries.
					
					 Not content with this, they have cracked down on the Koreans in Japan and encroached on their rights and this time instigated the Tokyo District Court to make an illegal decision on allowing the sale of the Korean Hall of Chongryon.
					
					 The decision made by the court is an illegal act contrary to the Japanese law, judicial precedents of the court and elementary practice of auction procedures.
					
					 We urge the Japanese authorities to stop at once their cunning and fraud moves infringing on the rights of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 We extend firm solidarity to the struggle of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Premeditated Crackdown on Chongryon Accused in Indonesia, Serbia
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Premeditated Crackdown on Chongryon Accused in Indonesia, Serbia
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Political parties of Indonesia and Serbia issued statements on April 3 and 4 in denunciation of Japan's crackdown upon the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The Pioneer Party of Indonesia said that the Japanese authorities' illegal decision on allowing the sale of the land and building of the Korean Hall of Chongryon is touching off the indignation of the Korean people and the world progressives, and went on:
					
					 The Korean Hall of Chongryon has played a role of the diplomatic mission of the DPRK for DPRK-Japan friendship and peace in Northeast Asia under the condition that there are no diplomatic relations between the two countries.
					
					 The Japanese authorities' behavior can never be justified with any excuse as it is a wanton violation of the dignity and vital rights of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and a grave encroachment on the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 The New Yugoslavia Communist Party of Serbia said:
					
					 The decision on allowing the sale of the Korean Hall is a premeditated and deliberate act to stamp out Chongryon, a dignified overseas citizens organization of the DPRK, and a typical outcome of the politically-motivated crackdown upon Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should stop at once the crackdown on Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 We appeal to the world progressive people loving and valuing justice to turn out as one in supporting the DPRK government and all the Korean people in their struggle to smash Japan's moves against the DPRK and defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Moves to Seize Korean Hall of Chongryon Assailed by Foreigners
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Moves to Seize Korean Hall of Chongryon Assailed by Foreigners
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Foreign personages in their statements on April 2 and 3 accused the Japanese authorities of their moves to crack down on the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The deputy general secretary of the National Democratic Congress of Ghana expressed astonishment at the Japanese authorities' behavior to seize the Korean Hall of Chongryon, an overseas citizens organization of the DPRK, and said:
					
					 Japan is a criminal state which had already committed heinous crimes against the Korean people.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Japanese authorities are trying to stamp out the center of the activities of Chongryon Central Standing Committee, another crime against the Korean people and a grave encroachment upon the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should stop the illegal moves to seize the Korean Hall of Chongryon and opt for improving the DPRK-Japan relations at an early date as demanded by the times desirous of peace.
					
					 Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, said that Japan fails to draw a lesson from its past crimes.
					
					 He said:
					
					 If the Japanese authorities do not stop their crackdown upon Chongryon, they will be wholly accountable for the consequences to be entailed by it.
					
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria who is chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, denounced the Japanese authorities' illegal decision on allowing the sale of the Korean Hall of Chongryon as a wanton violation of the dignity and vital rights of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and a grave infringement upon the sovereignty of the DPRK.

articles.title: Japan's Crackdown upon Chongryon Condemned by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Japan's Crackdown upon Chongryon Condemned by Foreign Organizations
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Organizations of different countries issued statements on April 5 and 7 in denunciation of the Japanese authorities' suppression of Chongryon (General Association of Korean Residents in Japan).
					 The League of the Yugoslavian Communist Youth in Serbia said:
					
					 The Japanese authorities have long regarded the Korean Hall of Chongryon on which the flag of the DPRK is fluttering as a thorn in their flesh and resorted to moves to seize it.
					
					 In the long run, they instigated the Tokyo District Court to fake up an unprecedented fraudulent farce in utter disregard of the Japanese law, judicial precedents of the court and practice of auction procedures.
					
					 We resolutely reject the decision to allow the sale of the Korean Hall and demand the Japanese authorities roll back their hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The Finland-Korea Society and the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea condemned the Japanese authorities' moves to seize the Korean Hall as a wanton violation of the dignity and rights of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association said:
					
					 We can never pardon the moves of Japan to seize the Korean Hall, not content with its suppression of Koreans in Japan, while not making an apology and reparation for the crimes committed against the Korean people.
					
					 The Korean Hall of Chongryon has played a role for the DPRK-Japan friendship and peace in Northeast Asia like the diplomatic mission of the DPRK under the condition that there are no diplomatic relations between the two countries.
					
					 We strongly demand Japan immediately withdraw its illegal decision on allowing the sale of the Korean Hall of Chongryon.

articles.title: Japan's Moves to Seize Korean Hall of Chongryon Slammed
articles.content:
Japan's Moves to Seize Korean Hall of Chongryon Slammed
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Koreans in the U.S. sent a protest letter to the Japanese prime minister, Cabinet Secretariat, Foreign Ministry and Ministry of Justice on April 4.
					 The letter termed the Japanese authorities' moves to forcibly sell the Korean Hall of Chongryon (General Association of Korean Residents in Japan) as another evil deed.
					
					 It denounced the Japanese authorities' above-said moves as a belligerent act of scrapping the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration and an act of suppressing and repressing Koreans in Japan.
					
					 It urged Japan to liquidate its inglorious past crimes and stop its moves to forcibly sell the Korean Hall of Chongryon.
					
					 It demanded Japan immediately take measures to ensure the position and role of Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe presente de secretario general de IIIJ
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe presente de secretario general de IIIJ
Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio presente que le dirigiera Kenichi Ogami, secretario general del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche, de visita en Corea.
					El visitante lo entrego el dia 12 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cestos de flores de extranjeros
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe cestos de flores de extranjeros
Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio los cestos de flores que le dirigieran el secretario general del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche (IIIJ), Kenichi Ogami, y su comitiva y la delegacion del Consejo Nacional de Enlace de las Sociedades Japonesas de Estudio del Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo presidida por el director del IIIJ, Takao Kamakura, de visita en Corea.
					El secretario general y el jefe de dicha delegacion los entregaron el dia 12 a un funcionario coreano, respectivamente.

articles.title: En Pyongyang la delegacion del Partido del Trabajo de Mexico
articles.content:
En Pyongyang la delegacion del Partido del Trabajo de Mexico
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, arribo el dia 12 a esta capital la delegacion del Partido del Trabajo de Mexico encabezada por su dirigente nacional Alberto Anaya Gutierrez.

articles.title: En Pyongyang delegaciones y delegados de grupos de estudio de idea Juche
articles.content:
En Pyongyang delegaciones y delegados de grupos de estudio de idea Juche
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- En ocasion del dia de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung (15 de abril, Dia del Sol), llegaron el dia 12 a esta capital la delegacion del Consejo Nacional de Enlace de Estudio de Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo de Japon encabezada por el director del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche, Takao Kamakura, la del Instituto de Estudio de la Idea Juche de Bangladesh dirigida por su secretario general Sheikh Rafiqul Islam Bablu, la de Grupo de Estudio de Obras de Camaradas Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il de Alemania presidida por Daniel Heinz Werner Ernst Junker, la de Asociacion Pakistani para el Estudio de Autoconfianza dirigida por Ghazi Salah Uddin, el presidente del Comite Nacional Nigeriano de Estudio de la Idea Juche, Alhassan Mamman Muhammad y su comitiva, el director general del Comite Regional Africano para el Estudio de la Idea Juche, Henry Masiko, el titular del Centro de Estudio de Autoconfianza de Bangladesh, Garib Newas, el presidente del Comite Nacional Finlandes para el Estudio de la Idea Juche, Juha Kieksy, el jefe del departamento del Presidium del Comite Central de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon, Han Tong Song, quien es director del IIIJ.
